item.description:
I am going to be totally redoing the way I teach Reiki coming in January.

This is the last time I will be teaching Reiki III this fast and this cheap. Catch it now before the price goes up!

Sometimes called the Master level this level works the karmic and spiritual bodies. You will learn the master symbols, receive the master level attunement and learn how to give attunements to others. Reiki Level III will take your Reiki into a whole new level and many people experience great joy and spiritual healing at this level.

This class is 6 hours of instruction (3 classes) and is $250 for the level. It will give you a Master Healer certificate.

Tuesday, Nov 2, Nov 16 and Nov 30th 7-9pm at Solstice Healing Arts Center in Medway MA.


REGISTER ONLINE! You can pay in installments too!

http://lisacampion.co...
508 533-0669 lisa@lisacampion.com

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: REIKI III
